id: Gold Star family starts new chapter in new home
paragraph: Four years after her fiancé was killed just weeks before returning home from Afghanistan, Christina Strange and her seven-year-old daughter Ariana have turned a new corner. A mortgage-free home was given to them by the Stephen Siller Tunnel to Towers Foundation, part of its new program to support Gold Star families.Nov. 12, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
